newsitem.title: COTE D'IVOIRE: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - Oct 12.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - Oct 12.

text.p: These are significant stories in the Ivorian press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Commodities Minister Guy-Alain Gauze denounces European plan for use of non-cocoa butter in chocolate; says five percent of non-cocoa additives will breach international accords.
- Prime Minister Daniel Kablan Dunca, on investment promotion mission in North America, signs gas production accord with Canada's Consulgaz, part of Gaz Metropolitain.
- Police avert clash between angry youths and Lebanese shopowners in Abidjan district of Adjame accused of conniving with local authorities to clear kiosk owners from the area.
- European Union to wait another two years before authorising use of vegetable fats other than cocoa in chocolate, Commodities Minister Gauze says at news briefing.
